English: It's so cold out here. I gotta head to the cave quickly.

Korean: 동굴이 우측 끝에 있다고 했으니 부지런히 가자.
English: I heard the cave is at the East side.

Korean: 어서 저 기둥 뒤에 숨어야 해!
English: I have to hide behind the pillar!

Korean: 눈보라에 밀려가기 전에 저 기둥까지 이동하자.
English: Lets move to the pillar before I get pushed out by the storm.
I knew it would be safe here.

Korean: 앞으로 이런 돌 기둥 뒤에서 눈보라를 피하면 좋겠네.
English: I should hide behind these pillars whenever the storm comes.
Ah.. I got no good feelings on this platform.
Pew..I should becareful of these platforms.
What is that hut. I looks warm inside.
I should go inside to warm up.
Finally I arrived at the cave.
I should place the sapling back, where it used to be.

Korean: 두번째 묘목도 무사히 돌려놓을 수 있겠어.
English: I'm glad I could place the second sapling.
Its gonna be a harsh road.
I should watch out for the ice thrones.
